name: Yakut Shaman
description:
Swipe to the side sweeps the guardsmen out of the way.
The path of the shaman. Help the Yakut shaman to overthrow the world's evil. Defuse the superior number of riot police. Conduct a rite and clear a vast territory of dark forces.
 
* Based on real events!
* Use different spells
* Dynamic gameplay will not let you get bored
* Collect spheres to replenish mana
* Share with friends
* Don't let the guards stop you
* Find out how the path of the Yakut shaman ended
